paper_keywords: Damped second order impulsive differential equation
paper_abstract: In this work we study the existence and regularity of mild solutions for a damped second order abstract functional differential equation with impulses. The results are obtained using the cosine function theory and fixed point criterions. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Existence results for a damped second order abstract functional differential equation with impulses
